name: ventia-monorepo
description: VentIA Monorepo - Next.js Frontend + FastAPI Backend

scripts.dev:backend: cd apps/backend && uv run uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.db:migrate: cd apps/backend && uv run alembic upgrade head
scripts.db:migrate:create: cd apps/backend && uv run alembic revision --autogenerate -m
scripts.db:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d postgres && timeout 5 && pnpm run db:migrate

author: VentIA Team
